GSD.product_version: versions from v4.15 to before v5.10.143
GSD.description:
soc: brcmstb: pm-arm: Fix refcount leak and __iomem leak bugs

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.143 by commit 6dc0251638a4a1a998506dbd4627f8317e907558, it was introduced in version v4.15 by commit 0b741b8234c86065fb6954d32d427b3f7e14756f. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: soc: brcmstb: pm-arm: Fix refcount leak and __iomem leak bugs
